faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about TierTrainer24
faq.subtitle: Everything about our intelligent pet training for dogs, cats, horses, small animals & birds with 14-day money-back guarantee

guarantee.question: How does the 14-day money-back guarantee work at TierTrainer24?
guarantee.answer: Our 14-day money-back guarantee is completely risk-free. Test all premium features: unlimited consultation chats via text, voice and images, individual training plans, behavior analysis and community access. Not satisfied? Within 14 days of purchase, you automatically get your money back ‚Äì no questions asked.

animals.question: For which animals does TierTrainer24 offer professional training?
animals.answer: TierTrainer24 is your expert for dogs, cats, horses, small animals (rabbits, guinea pigs, hamsters) and birds. Each training is individually adapted to your pet, its breed, age and specific needs ‚Äì from puppies from 8 weeks to adult animals.

analysis.question: How does the intelligent behavior analysis work?
analysis.answer: Our advanced behavior analysis works via text, voice or photo upload. Describe your pet's behavior or upload a photo ‚Äì our system immediately creates a professional analysis with individual training recommendations. Available 24/7 for all animal species.

success.question: What makes TierTrainer24 so successful?
success.answer: We have analyzed the most proven techniques from leading pet experts for each animal species and developed the best from them ‚Äì without expensive collaborations with individual experts. The result: Highly effective, scientifically based training methods for all animal species at a fraction of the cost.

community.question: How can I exchange ideas with other pet owners?
community.answer: In our community you can exchange ideas with other pet owners, share experiences and ask questions. You can also share videos and photos of your training and receive feedback from the community.

pricing.question: What does TierTrainer24 cost compared to local pet trainers?
pricing.answer: TierTrainer24 is significantly cheaper than local pet trainers. While a local trainer costs ‚Ç¨50-100 per hour, TierTrainer24 offers unlimited consultation starting at ‚Ç¨9.90/month. You not only save money, but also get 24/7 availability, personalized training plans and scientifically proven methods.

features.question: What premium features are included in the subscription?
features.answer: Your premium subscription includes: Unlimited consultation chats via text, voice and images, individual training plans, intelligent behavior analysis, community access, video upload for detailed analyses, priority support and regular progress reports. Everything in one package for maximum success.

devices.question: Can I use TierTrainer24 on all devices?
devices.answer: Yes! TierTrainer24 works on all devices: smartphone, tablet, laptop and desktop. Our web app is optimized for all screen sizes and works in any modern browser. You can seamlessly switch between devices and have access to your training plans and chat everywhere.

emergency.question: What about emergencies or medical problems?
emergency.answer: For medical emergencies or health problems, we always recommend an immediate visit to the veterinarian. TierTrainer24 is designed for behavior training and consultation, not for medical diagnoses. For behavioral changes that could indicate pain, please see a veterinarian.

stories.name: Thunder (Warmblood)

stories.name: Charlie (Budgerigar)
stories.story: Charlie was plucking his feathers and was very restless. TierTrainer quickly recognized stress signals and helped me improve his environment. He's much calmer now.

stories.name: Hoppel (Dwarf Rabbit)

agb.title: General Terms and Conditions (GTC)
agb.subtitle: Tiertrainer24 ‚Äì A product of Shopping-Guru GmbH

scope.title: 1. Scope of Application
scope.content: These General Terms and Conditions apply to all contracts between Shopping-Guru GmbH (hereinafter "we" or "Tiertrainer24") and users of our online platform tiertrainer24.com or tiertrainer1.com.

registration.title: 3. Registration & User Account
registration.content: Usage requires registration. After account creation, pet profiles can be managed and subscriptions can be concluded.

company.name: Shopping-Guru GmbH
company.vat: VAT identification number according to ¬ß 27a UStG: DE305366892

services.title: 2. Service Description
services.description: Tiertrainer24 provides digital online pet training with:

features.communication: Interactive communication via text, voice, and image

services.intro: Tiertrainer24 provides pet owners with digital online pet training. Included are:
services.communication: Interactive communication via text, voice and image
services.availability: Our services are available 24/7 online, are ad-free and contain no product placements.

contract.title: 4. Contract Conclusion & Subscription
contract.intro: A binding contract is concluded as soon as a paid subscription is selected and the payment process is completed.

trial.title: Trial period:
trial.period: 7-day free trial period without automatic debiting
trial.cancellation: Cancellation possible at any time in the user account
trial.autoRenewal: If no cancellation occurs during the trial period, the subscription is automatically activated for a fee

contract.binding: Binding contract when concluding a paid subscription.
contract.autoRenewal: Without cancellation, the subscription automatically becomes paid.

pricing.title: 5. Prices & Payment
pricing.intro: The prices displayed on www.tiertrainer24.com at the time of contract conclusion apply. Price changes remain reserved. All prices are inclusive of statutory VAT.
pricing.paymentMethods: The following payment methods are accepted:
pricing.autoDebit: Debiting takes place automatically according to the chosen subscription model.
pricing.content: All prices incl. VAT. Payment by credit card, PayPal, Klarna, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Amazon Pay.

delivery.title: 6. Service Delivery
delivery.content: Access to online pet training takes place directly after registration or after the trial period expires. Services are provided exclusively digitally.

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer & Medical Notice
disclaimer.intro: Tiertrainer24 does not provide medical, veterinary or therapeutic advice. Our content is based on AI-supported analyses and findings from animal behavior psychology, but does not replace a visit to a veterinarian.
disclaimer.liability: In case of health abnormalities in your pet, a veterinary practice must be consulted immediately. We assume no liability for damages resulting from incorrect self-treatment, omitted veterinary measures or misinterpretation of our content.
disclaimer.content: Tiertrainer24 does not replace veterinary consultation. For health problems, please contact a veterinary practice.

license.title: 8. Usage License
license.content: Upon contract conclusion, users receive a simple, non-transferable usage right for personal use of the content. Sharing, commercial use or publication is prohibited.

availability.title: 9. Availability
availability.content: We strive for stable availability of our platform. However, short-term maintenance work and technical failures cannot be ruled out.

cancellation.expiry: Right of cancellation expires with consent to immediate service commencement.
cancellation.title: 10. Right of Cancellation
cancellation.right: Consumers have a 14-day right of cancellation.

period.title: Period start:
period.content: The period begins with the conclusion of the contract.

exercise.title: Exercise of cancellation:
exercise.content: Simply by email to support@tiertrainer24.com or by post:

form.subtitle: (Please fill out and send in case of cancellation)

note.title: Note:
note.content: The right of cancellation expires prematurely if you expressly agree to digital content that the service provision begins before the cancellation period expires.

privacy.title: 11. Privacy
privacy.content: Personal data is processed exclusively for contract fulfillment in accordance with GDPR and BDSG. Details can be found in our privacy policy.

jurisdiction.title: 12. Jurisdiction & Final Provisions
jurisdiction.court: Jurisdiction, insofar as legally permissible, is Berlin.
jurisdiction.validity: Should individual clauses be invalid, the validity of the remaining ones remains unaffected.

impressum.title: Legal Notice
impressum.subtitle: Tiertrainer24 ‚Äì A product of Shopping-Guru GmbH

general.title: 2. General Data Processing
general.content: The protection of your personal data is our highest priority. We process your data exclusively within the framework of legal data protection regulations, in particular the GDPR and the BDSG.

registration.title: a) During registration and use:
registration.chatHistory: Chat history including text, image and voice messages

automatic.title: b) Automatically when visiting the website:

purposes.title: 4. Purposes of Data Processing
purposes.intro: We process your data for the following purposes:
purposes.services: Provision of our digital services (24/7 pet behavior consultation)
purposes.analysis: Analysis of animal behavior based on your inputs
purposes.platform: Operation, maintenance and improvement of the platform

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis
legalBasis.intro: The processing of your data is carried out in accordance with:
legalBasis.contract: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (contract fulfillment)
legalBasis.consent: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR (consent, e.g. for image or audio analysis)
legalBasis.legitimateInterest: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest: operation, security, functionality)
legalBasis.legalObligation: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. c GDPR (legal obligations)

paymentProviders.title: 6. Payment Service Providers
paymentProviders.intro: For payment processing, we use external providers. Payment data is transmitted directly to the following independently responsible services:
paymentProviders.note: These providers process data independently according to their respective privacy policies.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies & Tracking
cookies.necessary: We use technically necessary cookies to ensure the functionality of our website.
cookies.optional: Optional tracking tools (e.g. Google Analytics, Matomo) are only used after active consent via cookie banner.
cookies.withdrawal: You can revoke or change your consent at any time.

dataProcessing.title: 8. Data Processing & Data Transfer
dataProcessing.services: To provide our services, we use external service providers (e.g. for hosting, maintenance, support) who are obliged to confidentiality according to Art. 28 GDPR.
dataProcessing.noAdvertising: Data is never passed on to third parties for advertising purposes.

storage.title: 9. Storage Period
storage.duration: We only store personal data for as long as it is necessary for the respective purpose.
storage.deletion: After cancellation or prolonged inactivity, we delete your user account within 30 days, unless legal retention obligations prevent this.

rights.title: 10. Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the right at any time to:
rights.contact: To exercise your rights, please write to

security.title: 11. Security
security.content: Our platform uses modern security standards (e.g. SSL encryption) to protect your data from unauthorized access.

ai.title: 12. Note on AI-supported Functions
ai.content: Tiertrainer24 uses AI-supported systems for animal behavior analysis. Your texts, images and voice recordings are not used for the further development or training of AI, but exclusively for situational individual case processing.

changes.title: 13. Changes to this Statement
changes.intro: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy if necessary. You can find the current version at any time at:

dispute.description: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS):
dispute.emailInfo: You can find our email address above in the legal notice.

right.title: Right of Cancellation
right.content: You have the right to cancel this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason.

period.title: Cancellation Period
period.content: The cancellation period is fourteen days from the day of contract conclusion.

exercise.title: Exercise of the Right of Cancellation
exercise.description: To exercise your right of cancellation, you must inform us of your decision by means of a clear declaration:

form.title: Model Cancellation Form
form.description: If you want to cancel the contract, please fill out this form and send it back:
form.declaration: I/we hereby cancel the contract concluded by me/us for the provision of the following service:

consequences.title: Consequences of Cancellation
consequences.content: If you cancel this contract, we will refund all payments we have received from you immediately and no later than fourteen days from the day on which we received notification of your cancellation of this contract.

expiry.title: Premature Expiry of the Right of Cancellation
expiry.content: Your right of cancellation expires prematurely if we have begun to execute the service after you have given your express consent and at the same time confirmed that you lose your right of cancellation as soon as we have completely begun to execute the service.
